actions.name: Stalwart
actions.description: Effect: The user is immune to the [Push] effect and its attacks cannot have their target redirected (ie, unaffected by @Affliction[marked] and [Draw-In] effects). The user's Lift skill checks have one more degree of success.

system.description: Effect: The user is immune to the [Push] effect and its attacks cannot have their target redirected (ie, unaffected by @Affliction[marked] and [Draw-In] effects). The user's Lift skill checks have one more degree of success.
